    Charlie Duclut

    Associate professor at Institut Curie and Sorbonne Université

    • Paris, France
    • Email
    • ResearchGate
    • Google Scholar
    • ORCID

    CV

    Education

    • Bachelor and Master degrees at the École Normale Supérieure (ENS), Paris, France. Master program Macroscopic Physics and Complexity.
    • Ph.D. in theoretical physics supervised by Bertrand Delamotte, Laboratoire de Physique Théorique de la Matière Condensée (LPTMC), Université Paris VI (UPMC), Paris, France.

    Research experience

    • Feb. - Jul. 2012: Research internship
      • Los Alamos National Laboratory (LANL), New Mexico, USA.
      • Supervisor: Michael Chertkov
    • Feb. - Jun. 2013: Research internship
      • Laboratoire de Physique Statistique (LPS), Paris, France.
      • Supervisor: Vincent Hakim
    • Nov. 2017 - Nov. 2021: Postdoc
      • Max Planck Institute for the Physics of Complex Systems (MPI-PKS), Dresden, Germany.
      • Advisor: Frank Jülicher
    • Dec. 2021 - Aug. 2022: Postdoc
      • Matière et Systèmes Complexes (MSC), Paris, France.
      • Advisor: Julien Tailleur
    • Since Sep. 2022: Associate professor
      • Sorbonne Université and Physico-Chimie Curie laboratory, Paris, France.

    Teaching experience

    • 2014-2017: Teaching assistant
      • Université Paris VI (UPMC), Paris, France.
      • Tutorials and laboratory courses in thermodynamics and mechanics (undergrad students).
    • Winter semester 2019: Teaching assistant
      • Technische Universität Dresden (TU-Dresden), Dresden, Germany.
      • Tutorials for the course Stochastic Modelling and Simulation (master students).
    • Since Sep. 2022: Associate professor
      • Sorbonne Université and Physico-Chimie Curie laboratory, Paris, France.

    Publications

    • Hysteresis, phase transitions, and dangerous transients in electrical power distribution systems

      "Hysteresis, phase transitions, and dangerous transients in electrical power distribution systems", C. Duclut, S. Backhaus, and M. Chertkov, Phys. Rev. E 87, 62802 (2013).

    • Langevin Equations for Reaction-Diffusion Processes

      "Langevin Equations for Reaction-Diffusion Processes", F. Benitez, C. Duclut, H. Chaté, B. Delamotte, I. Dornic, and M. A. Muñoz, Phys. Rev. Lett. 117, 100601 (2016).

    • Frequency regulators for the nonperturbative renormalization group: A general study and the model A as a benchmark

      "Frequency regulators for the nonperturbative renormalization group: A general study and the model A as a benchmark", C. Duclut, and B. Delamotte, Phys. Rev. E 95, 12107 (2017).

    • Nonuniversality in the erosion of tilted landscapes

      "Nonuniversality in the erosion of tilted landscapes", C. Duclut, and B. Delamotte, Phys. Rev. E 96, 12149 (2017).

    • Fluid pumping and active flexoelectricity can promote lumen nucleation in cell assemblies

      "Fluid pumping and active flexoelectricity can promote lumen nucleation in cell assemblies", C. Duclut, N. Sarkar, J. Prost, and F. Jülicher, Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. U.S.A. 116, 19264 (2019).

    • Nonequilibrium polarity-induced chemotaxis: Emergent Galilean symmetry and exact scaling exponents

      "Nonequilibrium polarity-induced chemotaxis: Emergent Galilean symmetry and exact scaling exponents", S. Mahdisoltani, R. Ben Alì Zinati, C. Duclut, A. Gambassi, and R. Golestanian, Phys. Rev. Research 3, 13100 (2021).

    • Hydraulic and electric control of cell spheroids

      "Hydraulic and electric control of cell spheroids", C. Duclut, J. Prost, and F. Jülicher, Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. U.S.A. 118, e2021972118 (2021).

    • Nonlinear rheology of cellular networks

      "Nonlinear rheology of cellular networks", C. Duclut, J. Paijmans, M. M. Inamdar, C. D. Modes, and F. Jülicher, Cells & Development 168, 203746 (2021).

    • Coarse-grained curvature tensor on polygonal surfaces

      "Coarse-grained curvature tensor on polygonal surfaces", C. Duclut, A. Amiri, J. Paijmans, and F. Jülicher, SciPost Phys. Core 5, 11 (2022).

    • Passive odd viscoelasticity

      "Passive odd viscoelasticity", R. Lier, J. Armas, S. Bo, C. Duclut, F. Jülicher, P. Surówka, Phys. Rev. E 105, 54607 (2022).

    • Stochastic dynamics of chemotactic colonies with logistic growth

      "Stochastic dynamics of chemotactic colonies with logistic growth", R. Ben Alì Zinati, C. Duclut, S. Mahdisoltani, A. Gambassi, and R. Golestanian, EPL 136, 50003 (2022).

    • Active T1 transitions in cellular networks

      "Active T1 transitions in cellular networks", C. Duclut, J. Paijmans, M. M. Inamdar, C. D. Modes, and F. Jülicher, Eur. Phys. J. E 45, 29 (2022).

    • Lift force in odd compressible fluids

      "Lift force in odd compressible fluids", R. Lier, C. Duclut, S. Bo, J. Armas, F. Jülicher, P. Surówka, Phys. Rev. E 108, L023101 (2023).

    • Auxiliary fields approach to shift-symmetric theories: the φ^4 derivative theory and the crumpled-to-flat transition of membranes at two-loop order

      "Auxiliary fields approach to shift-symmetric theories: the φ^4 derivative theory and the crumpled-to-flat transition of membranes at two-loop order", L. Delzescaux, C. Duclut, D. Mouhanna, and M. Tissier, Phys. Rev. D 108, L081702 (2023).

    • Random traction yielding transition in epithelial tissues

      "Random traction yielding transition in epithelial tissues", A. Amiri, C. Duclut, F. Jülicher, M. Popović, Phys. Rev. Lett. 131, 188401 (2023).

    • Core PCP mutations affect short time mechanical properties but not tissue morphogenesis in the Drosophila pupal wing

      "Core PCP mutations affect short time mechanical properties but not tissue morphogenesis in the Drosophila pupal wing", R. Piscitello-Gómez, F. S. Gruber, A. Krishna, C. Duclut, C. D. Modes, M. Popović, F. Jülicher, N. A. Dye, S. Eaton, eLife 12, e85581 (2023).

    • Nematic Torques in Scalar Active Matter: When Fluctuations Favor Polar Order and Persistence

      "Nematic Torques in Scalar Active Matter: When Fluctuations Favor Polar Order and Persistence", G. Spera, C. Duclut, M. Durand, J. Tailleur, Phys. Rev. Lett. 132, 078301 (2024).

    • Emergent chirality in active solid rotation of pancreas spheres

      "Emergent chirality in active solid rotation of pancreas spheres", T. H. Tan, A. Amiri, I. Seijo-Barandiarán, M. F. Staddon, A. Materne, S. Tomas, C. Duclut, M. Popović, A. Grapin-Botton, F. Jülicher, bioRxiv:2022.09.29.510101 (2022).

    • Probe particles in odd active viscoelastic fluids: how activity and dissipation determine linear stability

      "Probe particles in odd active viscoelastic fluids: how activity and dissipation determine linear stability", C. Duclut, S. Bo, R. Lier, J. Armas, F. Jülicher, P. Surówka, arXiv:2310.08640 (2023).

    • Active shape programming drives Drosophila wing disc eversion

      "Active shape programming drives Drosophila wing disc eversion", J. F. Fuhrmann, A. Krishna, J. Paijmans, C. Duclut, S. Eaton, M. Popović, F. Jülicher, C. D. Modes, N. A. Dye, bioRxiv:2023.12.23.573034 (2023).

    • Fluctuation-Induced First Order Transition to Collective Motion

      "Fluctuation-Induced First Order Transition to Collective Motion", D. Martin, G. Spera, H. Chaté, C. Duclut, C. Nardini, J. Tailleur, F. van Wijland , arXiv:2402.05078 (2024).
